column14: a> The Car Camera has couples of parts: 1. GPS Receiver(It uses for the position tracking) 2. Backup Camera 3. Car Charger(With about 1m wire) 4. Backup Camera Cable(21ft) 5. Mount Bracket for inside and outside 6. Straps(4).
